name: Stranded in the Darkness
description:
Game submission for Pizza Jam

This game is just a prototype and it is very short and incomplete. The game has LOTS of poorly made areas, and the ending kinda broke...so just quit after falling. Also there are spelling and grammar mistakes caused by me changing  the dialogue poorly. The game was made in a  couple of hours, so i just hope it works.

Also, thanks for the guys at freesound.org for the SFX, as well as the person where I got the font from (I used it a long time ago)
